Class Word

  • java.lang.Object
    • Word

  • public class Word
extends java.lang.Object
    CS-212 LAB (B) This is part of project 4 that takes word array and has word_size and valid checker in class.
    Author:
    Navidur Rahman

      static int WORD_SIZE
      The word size to work with.

      • verifyWord

        public static boolean verifyWord(java.lang.String word)
        Checking for a valid word according to the word size given using pattern match.
        Parameters:
        word - takes the word as input.
        Returns:
        true if it's only correct word size(three) and letters only.
